doc.title: A Centered Universe
doc.plot: 80-year old sculptor Harry Holl's contributions to the art world are significant, having founded several arts organizations including the Cape Museum of Fine Arts. But as A Centered Universe reveals, Holl's achievements come at a price. Exploring both the light and dark side of creative genius, this poignant documentary shows Holl sacrificing family, finances and mental health at various stages of his life and career all for the sake of his art.
